[ library(m_map) | Third Party Libraries | Reference Manual | Alphabetic Index ]

to_sorted_assoc_list(+Map, -AssocList)

Converts a map into a (sorted) association list.
Map
A map
AssocList
A sorted list of the key-value pairs from Map

Description

AssocList is a sorted list containing the key/value pairs from the map Map, in the form Key-Value.

This predicate should only be called with maps created by other predicates from the map module.

Fail Conditions

Never fails.

Resatisfiable

no

See Also

to_assoc_list / 2, from_sorted_assoc_list / 2
